name: The Dream Dimension
summary: The Dream Dimension is an immersive exploration game where you enter various whimsical dream worlds while collecting dream shards along the way. Collecting dream shards will open up new worlds to explore. There are 16 unique dream worlds with a total of 50 dream shards.   Discover magical ruins, traverse alien structures, explore fantasy villages, climb giant mushrooms, and much more! The Dream Dimension is not about the destination but the journey. Travel at your own pace and enjoy the scenery.
